pageContext.claim: “The New York Times had no legitimate sources, which would be totally illegal, concerning the Mueller Report. In fact, they probably had no sources at all! They are a Fake Newspaper who have already been forced to apologize for their incorrect and very bad reporting on me!”
pageContext.analysis: The New York Times did not apologize to Trump. In this tweet, the president is criticizing a Times article that described how some of the investigators on special counsel Robert Mueller's team were frustrated by the limited descriptions that Attorney General William Barr, in a March 24 letter, gave about their findings. They told the Times their report was tougher on Trump than Barr had let on. The Washington Post shortly thereafter corroborated the New York Times's reporting. Once the full Mueller report was released, it quickly became clear that Barr did play down the Mueller team's findings. We gave Three Pinocchios to the attorney general.
